title: Serve the daedalus model via an API
text: Clone repository run following command repository directory build Docker image described docker/Dockerfile. need Docker Engine . may also need sudo permissions. Instructions build directly repository added soon.
code: # the image will be assigned the tag 'latest' docker build . -f docker/Dockerfile -t daedalus.api:latest  # run the container # see docker run --help for options docker run -d --rm -p 8001:8001 daedalus.api:latest  # check root endpoint `GET/` curl -s http://localhost:8001 | jq

title: Serve the daedalus model via an API
text: See daedalus package implements DAEDALUS integrated model economic, social, health costs pandemic.
